alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 5:01AM CDT until August 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from earlier excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 458 AM CDT, Gauge reports indicate Bear Branch at FM 2978 is out of banks. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas in the vicinity of Bear Branch at FM 2978. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
